__e: HE'S SO LUCKY TO LIVE IN THE OLD WORLD.
Let me just tell you, there is nothing like dying to make you hungry to live.
You know, I had tried on occasion to find something that would encourage him to live.
To really know what an apple is, to be interested in it, to understand it, to converse with it is really seeing it.
Let me just tell you, there is nothing like dying to make you hungry to live.
And another part couldn't resist letting him know that I knew exactly where he was.
